game.name: Motorbike Drive
game.description:
Are you the one who loves bike riding on highways? If yes, we have got you covered with a brand new racing game where you will get a chance to drive an exclusive bike on the multiple tracks. Select any from three fabulous bike options and four maps and be prepared to ride a lovely motorbike in a realistic environment in Motorbike Drive! This awesome 3D bike driving simulator allows the players to explore a multitude of platforms specially designed for motorbike and stunt lovers.

In many instances of this HTML5 bike game, you would realise as you are driving bikes in real. Multiple scenes of desert, urban, scenes of water and scenes of plains are covered in different maps. The complications and challenges of each map are different. Choose your motorcycle attentively and get ready to hit the road on your bike like a champion! Hey! You have to fight against the sand in the desert map. Get ready to be stormed with other tricks in other areas!

This cool motorbike stunt driving game features easy controls, seamless gameplay and 3D realistic scene simulation. Ride racer, police and cross motorbikes and allow yourself to drive your chosen bike freely in the whole platforms and ramps! We have a wider collection of free racing games that are playable on multiple latest browsers and devices including PCs, desktops, tablets, iPhones or iPads. Ride alone or invite your friends to have fun right from the comfort of your home!
